data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Yulin, Shaanxi, China.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yulin, Shaanxi, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Yulin that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Yulin to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Yulin to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Guaigun people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Yulin with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Yulin prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Yulin, Shaanxi, China has a population of 90,900.

We estimate Yulin has 6,896 people who might know Jesus, 1,468 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 82,536 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 90.8 percent of the people of Yulin are far from Jesus.
